about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
If a calming and invigorating immersion is what you seek, Elevated Sights is the experience for you. You find yourself starting on a cliff above a large river and a pleasing view of the city across the way. Next, you are taken to an old paper mill long forgotten and overtaken by mother nature. Soak in the sun as it peeks through the tree leaves. Followed by that wonderful retreat you will find yourself indulging in a gorgeous sunset over a mountainous fall landscape.

Purpose
Calming
Mindfulness
Acrophobia

Length
10:00

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
